How many people are affected by ALG6-congenital disorder of glycosylation ?,"The prevalence of ALG6-CDG is unknown, but it is thought to be the second most common type of congenital disorder of glycosylation. More than 30 cases of ALG6-CDG have been described in the scientific literature.",GHR,ALG6-congenital disorder of glycosylation
